h2_title: List of Achievements and Trophies in Black Myth: Wukong
content: In the table below, you'll find all the trophies and achievements available to unlock in the game. Trophies that you'll find on both PC and PS5 are marked accordingly, and those that are PS5 exclusives can be found at the bottom of the table. **Any with no notes next to them are only available on PC**.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'List of Achievements and Trophies in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
In the table below, you'll find all the trophies and achievements available to unlock in the game. Trophies that you'll find on both PC and PS5 are marked accordingly, and those that are PS5 exclusives can be found at the bottom of the table. **Any with no notes next to them are only available on PC**.
